languages.text: {n}Паскаль застывает, но в визоре его вспыхивают зеленые искры. Вытянув руку к Тарзусу, он лязгающим голосом отвечает:{/n} "Да будет прерван Цикл!" {n}Вы понимаете, что слова Паскаля звучат и из его вокса, и из вокса Тарзуса. А затем все датчики на боевой упряжи палача ослепительно вспыхивают, и рев боли раненого бронированного левиафана оглушает вас.{/n}

{n}Pasqal freezes, but green sparks light up in his visor. He extends a hand toward Tarzus and replies, in a clanging voice,{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued!" {n}You realise Pasqal's words are coming from both his own vox and Tarzus's. Then every sensor on the executioner's battle harness lights up at once, blindingly, and the wounded armoured leviathan lets out a deafening roar of pain.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Паскаль застывает, но в визоре его вспыхивают зеленые искры. Вытянув руку к Тарзусу, он лязгающим голосом отвечает:{/n} "Да будет прерван Цикл!" {n}Вы понимаете, что слова Паскаля звучат и из его вокса, и из вокса Тарзуса. А затем все датчики на боевой упряжи палача ослепительно вспыхивают, и рев боли раненого бронированного левиафана оглушает вас.{/n}

languages.text: {n}パスカルは動きを止めたが、緑の閃光が彼のバイザーを照らす。彼はうるさく反響する声で答えた。{/n}「サイクルを断ち切れ！」{n}あなたはパスカルの言葉が彼自身のヴォクスとターザスのそれの両方から聞こえてくるのに気づいた。執行人の戦闘ハーネスの全てのセンサーが目をくらますように一斉に光る。傷を負った装甲巨船は苦痛の轟音をあげた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal freezes, but green sparks light up in his visor. He extends a hand toward Tarzus and replies, in a clanging voice,{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued!" {n}You realise Pasqal's words are coming from both his own vox and Tarzus's. Then every sensor on the executioner's battle harness lights up at once, blindingly, and the wounded armoured leviathan lets out a deafening roar of pain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルは動きを止めたが、緑の閃光が彼のバイザーを照らす。彼はうるさく反響する声で答えた。{/n}「サイクルを断ち切れ！」{n}あなたはパスカルの言葉が彼自身のヴォクスとターザスのそれの両方から聞こえてくるのに気づいた。執行人の戦闘ハーネスの全てのセンサーが目をくらますように一斉に光る。傷を負った装甲巨船は苦痛の轟音をあげた。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡僵在原地，但他的面甲上冒出了绿色的火花。他向塔祖斯伸出一只手，以铿锵有力的声音回答道。{/n}“让循环终止吧！”{n}你意识到，帕斯卡和塔祖斯的音阵系统同时响起了这句话。随后，塔祖斯盔甲上所有的传感器都亮了起来，令人眼花缭乱。这个受了伤的装甲巨兽发出了震耳欲聋的痛苦吼声。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal freezes, but green sparks light up in his visor. He extends a hand toward Tarzus and replies, in a clanging voice,{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued!" {n}You realise Pasqal's words are coming from both his own vox and Tarzus's. Then every sensor on the executioner's battle harness lights up at once, blindingly, and the wounded armoured leviathan lets out a deafening roar of pain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡僵在原地，但他的面甲上冒出了绿色的火花。他向塔祖斯伸出一只手，以铿锵有力的声音回答道。{/n}“让循环终止吧！”{n}你意识到，帕斯卡和塔祖斯的音阵系统同时响起了这句话。随后，塔祖斯盔甲上所有的传感器都亮了起来，令人眼花缭乱。这个受了伤的装甲巨兽发出了震耳欲聋的痛苦吼声。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal erstarrt, aber in seinem Visor erscheinen grüne Funken. Er streckt Tarzus eine Hand entgegen und antwortet mit klirrender Stimme:{/n} "Auf dass der Zyklus nicht fortgesetzt werde!" {n}Du erkennst, dass Pasqals Worte nicht nur aus seinem Vox kommen, sondern auch aus dem von Tarzus. Dann gehen sämtliche Lichter an der Kampfpanzerung des Henkers auf einmal an, sodass alle geblendet sind. Der verwundete gepanzerte Leviathan stößt einen ohrenbetäubenden Schmerzensschrei aus.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal freezes, but green sparks light up in his visor. He extends a hand toward Tarzus and replies, in a clanging voice,{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued!" {n}You realise Pasqal's words are coming from both his own vox and Tarzus's. Then every sensor on the executioner's battle harness lights up at once, blindingly, and the wounded armoured leviathan lets out a deafening roar of pain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal erstarrt, aber in seinem Visor erscheinen grüne Funken. Er streckt Tarzus eine Hand entgegen und antwortet mit klirrender Stimme:{/n} "Auf dass der Zyklus nicht fortgesetzt werde!" {n}Du erkennst, dass Pasqals Worte nicht nur aus seinem Vox kommen, sondern auch aus dem von Tarzus. Dann gehen sämtliche Lichter an der Kampfpanzerung des Henkers auf einmal an, sodass alle geblendet sind. Der verwundete gepanzerte Leviathan stößt einen ohrenbetäubenden Schmerzensschrei aus.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal s'immobilise, mais des étincelles vertes illuminent sa visière. Une main tendue vers Tarzus, il rétorque d'une voix cinglante : {/n}« Que le cycle soit rompu ! » {n}Vous vous apercevez que les propos de Pasqal viennent à la fois de son propre vox et de celui de Tarzus. Puis, tous les capteurs de l'armure du bourreau s'allument simultanément dans une clarté aveuglante et le léviathan blessé pousse un mugissement de douleur assourdissant.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal freezes, but green sparks light up in his visor. He extends a hand toward Tarzus and replies, in a clanging voice,{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued!" {n}You realise Pasqal's words are coming from both his own vox and Tarzus's. Then every sensor on the executioner's battle harness lights up at once, blindingly, and the wounded armoured leviathan lets out a deafening roar of pain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal s'immobilise, mais des étincelles vertes illuminent sa visière. Une main tendue vers Tarzus, il rétorque d'une voix cinglante : {/n}« Que le cycle soit rompu ! » {n}Vous vous apercevez que les propos de Pasqal viennent à la fois de son propre vox et de celui de Tarzus. Puis, tous les capteurs de l'armure du bourreau s'allument simultanément dans une clarté aveuglante et le léviathan blessé pousse un mugissement de douleur assourdissant.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal se queda paralizado, pero su visor se ilumina con unas chispas verdes. Extiende una mano hacia Tarzus y replica con voz estentórea. {/n}«¡Que se interrumpa el Ciclo!». {n}Te das cuenta de que las palabras de Pasqal proceden de su propio voco sintetizador y del de Tarzus. En ese momento, todos los sensores del arnés de combate del verdugo se iluminan al mismo tiempo, con una intensidad cegadora, y el coloso acorazado profiere un ensordecedor rugido de dolor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal freezes, but green sparks light up in his visor. He extends a hand toward Tarzus and replies, in a clanging voice,{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued!" {n}You realise Pasqal's words are coming from both his own vox and Tarzus's. Then every sensor on the executioner's battle harness lights up at once, blindingly, and the wounded armoured leviathan lets out a deafening roar of pain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal se queda paralizado, pero su visor se ilumina con unas chispas verdes. Extiende una mano hacia Tarzus y replica con voz estentórea. {/n}«¡Que se interrumpa el Ciclo!». {n}Te das cuenta de que las palabras de Pasqal proceden de su propio vocosintetizador y del de Tarzus. En ese momento, todos los sensores del arnés de combate del verdugo se iluminan al mismo tiempo, con una intensidad cegadora, y el coloso acorazado profiere un ensordecedor rugido de dolor.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal olduğu yerde donuyor, vizöründe yeşil kıvılcımlar çakmaya başlıyor. Bir elini Tarzus'a doğru uzatıp çınlayan bir sesle yanıt veriyor.{/n} "Döngü'nün süreği bozulsun!" {n}Pasqal'ın sözlerinin hem kendi voksundan hem de Tarzus'un voksundan geldiğini fark ediyorsun. Ardından infazcının savaş giysisindeki tüm sensörler, kör edici bir parıltıyla aynı anda yanıyor. Yaralı zırhlı azman da acı dolu, sağır edici bir kükreme sesi çıkarıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal freezes, but green sparks light up in his visor. He extends a hand toward Tarzus and replies, in a clanging voice,{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued!" {n}You realise Pasqal's words are coming from both his own vox and Tarzus's. Then every sensor on the executioner's battle harness lights up at once, blindingly, and the wounded armoured leviathan lets out a deafening roar of pain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal olduğu yerde donuyor ancak vizöründe yeşil kıvılcımlar çakmaya başlıyor. Bir elini Tarzus'a doğru uzatıyor ve çınlayan bir sesle yanıt veriyor:{/n} "Döngü'nün süreği bozulsun!" {n}Pasqal'ın sözlerinin hem kendi voksundan hem de Tarzus'un voksundan geldiğini fark ediyorsun. Ardından infazcının savaş giysisindeki tüm sensörler aynı anda, kör edici bir parıltıyla yanıyor ve yaralı zırhlı azman, acı dolu, sağır edici bir şekilde kükrüyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
